author: Special Correspondent
text:
In a tragic incident, a contract worker engaged in erection of 230 kv transmission tower line from Adani Green Energy (Tamil Nadu) Limited Solar Park in Sengapadai to Kavanur near Paramakudi fell from an electric tower and died.

Police said that K. Chandrasekar (34) from Sembatti taluk in Dindigul district was on top of a 100-foot-tall tower and supervising the erection of the power line on Thursday morning when he fell from it.

He was rushed to the local government hospital but succumbed to his injuries soon after admission. The transmission tower line erection wing of Tamil Nadu Generation and Distribution Corporation (Tangedco) had engaged the worker, the police said. The wing was erecting the 230 kv power line from Sengapadai to Kavanur substation for transmitting solar power generated by Adani Green Energy Limited. The police have registered a complaint and are investigating.
title: Worker falls from electric tower, dies
